com.facebook.litho.widget

Class RecyclerViewWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.ViewGroup
      • android.support.v4.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout
        • com.facebook.litho.widget.RecyclerViewWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.view.NestedScrollingChild, android.support.v4.view.NestedScrollingParent

    public class RecyclerViewWrapper
extends android.support.v4.widget.SwipeRefreshLayout
    Wrapper that encapsulates all the features RecyclerSpec provides such as sticky header and pull-to-refresh
